```{r lib}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
data_dir <- here::here("analysis", "data", "input")
input_files <- list.files(path = data_dir, pattern = "*.iqdat",
                          full.names = TRUE)

data <- read_tsv(input_files[1])
```

```{r}
## Inspect data
data %>% colnames()
data %>% head()

data %>% group_by(blockcode) %>% count()
data %>% group_by(trialcode) %>% count()



data %>% group_by(blockcode, trialcode) %>% count() # Block "main_z" has incorrect trialcode, main_slash
data %>% group_by(trialcode) %>% summarize()
```
